column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Although it's a little pricey for a bowl of ramen
column4: and amazing ambiance was more than worth the experience. My small group had only stayed long enough to finish the food we had
column5: but our experience there was really nice and it felt like we stayed there for a really long time while catching up on each other's lives. Our visit didn't feel rushed
column6: nor did it feel like they wanted to kick us out ASAP.
